Auditions for US contestants begin on 27 March in Los Angeles. Other sessions follow in Chicago, Dallas, Miami, Seattle and New York. Talking at a news conference Simon Cowell said: The top contestant will get$ 1 million( Â£ 619,000) a year for five years, separate from the costs involved in recording and promotion. ''It's a massive, massive risk but it's also an incredible incentive. It puts everybody, rightly, under an enormous amount of pressure. ''I believe I can find a star. But he admitted: ''If they don't sell a single record they still get to keep the money. It is pressure, because if the wrong person wins, I'm in trouble.
